product.longDescription: Allure is the first organic synergistic variety on the market. The 8" ears are refined and have both great tip fill and excellent flavor. Plenty of flags and tight, dark green husks create an attractive package. Good cool-soil vigor for a synergistic type. 6 1/2–7' tall plants. High resistance to common rust. Unsized seed. USDA Certified Organic. Avg. 2,600 seeds/lb. Packet: 150 seeds.

Allure Organic (F1) Corn Seed

Product ID:3894G.113894G

Allure is the first organic synergistic variety on the market. The 8" ears are refined and have both great tip fill and excellent flavor. Plenty of flags and tight, dark green husks create an attractive package. Good cool-soil vigor for a synergistic type. 6 1/2–7' tall plants. High resistance to common rust. Unsized seed. USDA Certified Organic. Avg. 2,600 seeds/lb. Packet: 150 seeds.
